name: Huq Industries
desc: Geo-location data sourced from 1000s of app partners across 239 countries.
top_tickers: LN:BBY, LN:GNK, LN:GRG, LN:MKS, LN:MRW, UN:GPS, UN:HD, UN:MAR, UN:MCD
full_ticker_coverage: All relevant assets have been mapped to listed securities via OpenFiGi.
full_sector_coverage: Our flagship geo-behavioural dataset measures the retail, lifestyle and working habits of millions of consumers across the globe. Huq also offers the most detailed and pervasive global mobile handset and network subscription trends data on the market.
sectors: Airlines, Autos, Consumer, Real Estate, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Telecom, TMT & Entertainment, Transportation, Travel
pricing_structure: We offer a 3-month non-commercial evaluation period to enable backtesting, following which access to daily data is provided on a subscription basis.
why_us?: Our unique methodology provides the highest accuracy geo-data in the market.
advantages: Our data offers the clearest and most accurate representation of real-world consumer interactions globally.
use_cases: Our data is a proxy for footfall across retail and industrial sectors.
